4316730.description:
Turn your ideas into interactive adventures.

Forget complex scripts and intimidating programming. Visual Novel Nodal Editor is built for writers, artists, and indie creators who want to focus on what matters: the story. With its visual node-based interface, you master your game's narrative flow at a glance.

ğŸ¨ Total Creative Freedom

Don't limit yourself to text. Our engine integrates an advanced layer system comparable to graphic design software.

  • Dynamic Staging: Layer backgrounds, characters, and effects.

  • Smooth Animations: Use Bezier curves to move, zoom, or rotate your elements in real-time.

  • Immersive Audio: Manage music, sound effects, and ambience directly within your scene timeline.

ğŸ”— The Power of Nodes

Visualize your branching storylines like never before.

  • Drag & Drop: Create multiple choices simply by connecting nodes.

  • Code-Free Logic: Manage conditions, loops, and multiple endings visually.

  • Clear Organization: Zoom in on a specific dialogue or zoom out to see the global structure of your narrative.

âš¡ From Editing to Publishing

The tool is designed for production.

  • Instant Preview: Test the scene you are editing or play the full story with zero load time.

  • Asset Manager: A centralized library for your images, sounds, and videos.

  • Standalone Export: Generate a standalone executable (.exe) in one click, ready for distribution on Steam or elsewhere. Your players need nothing else to play.
